Uses of Interface
core.msgpump.IMsgPump

  • Packages that use IMsgPump 
    Package Description
    core
    Provides the classes necessary for core functions: Main, I/O (game data, logger, languages), ...
    core.msgpump  
    gameview
    Provides the classes necessary for the game view.
    logic
    Provides the classes necessary for the game logic.
